department.dept_long_name: Department of East Asian Languages and Civilizations

course.title: Elementary Korean for Advanced Beginners
course.meeting_text: M., W., F., at 10, and two additional hours to be arranged.
course.description: Designed for students with some listening and speaking background, either from prior formal learning or previous exposure to a Korean speaking community. Introductory Korean course, with emphasis on reading and writing. After successful completion of this course, students are expected be able to understand main ideas and/or some facts from the simple connected texts dealing with basic personal and social needs and to be able to meet a number of practical writing needs.
